entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 56 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
